title: KUMA DESTROYS EVERYONE & EVERYTHING! - One Piece Episode 375 & 376 REACTION + REVIEW!
author: JennAnime
description: First-time watcher reaction to episodes 375 and 376 of One Piece, covering Kuma's arrival and his devastating display of the Nikyu Nikyu no Mi powers culminating in the Ursus Shock attack.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses events from episodes 375-376, may hint at episode 377

title: ONE PIECE EP 376 'Kuma's Nikyu Nikyu Power That Deflects Everything' Full Length Reaction
author: mikeyventure
description: Full-length reaction to One Piece Episode 376 focusing on Bartholomew Kuma's revelation of his Nikyu Nikyu no Mi Devil Fruit powers and the devastating Ursus Shock technique.

title: One Piece Episode 376 Review
author: deculture
description: Contemporary review of Episode 376 from when it originally aired. Praises the episode for returning 'with a BANG!' with 'pretty epic' content, 'great' story pacing, above-standard animation quality, and music that 'fitted well to increase the episode's intensity.'

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contemporary review that may reference upcoming episodes

title: One Piece Ep. 376 Recap: 'It Repels Everything Kuma's Paw-Paw Power'
author: The Adult Swim Squad
description: Detailed recap of Episode 376 covering Kuma's mission from the World Government to eliminate witnesses to Moria's defeat, his revelation of the Nikyu Nikyu no Mi powers, and the devastating Ursus Shock attack that destroys Thriller Bark.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Detailed recap with potential hints about following episode

title: 375-376: 'Not Out of Danger Yet! Orders to Annihilate the Straw Hat Crew' and 'It Repels Everything! Kuma's Paw-Paw Power!'
author: Never Watched One Piece (Tumblr)
description: First-time viewer's perspective on episodes 375-376. Describes Kuma as 'probably the strongest person on Thriller Bark' with 'freaking astonishing' Paw-Paw fruit powers. Discusses the tension of the exhausted Straw Hats facing an overwhelmingly powerful opponent.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: First-time viewer reactions to these specific episodes

title: One Piece: 10 Best Episodes of the Thriller Bark Saga, Ranked
author: CBR Editorial
description: Rankings and analysis of the best Thriller Bark episodes. Discusses Episode 376 in the context of Kuma's Ursus Shock and how it sets up the legendary Episode 377. Highlights the tension and desperation of the Straw Hats' situation.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses entire Thriller Bark arc including later episodes

title: A guide to One Piece's Bartholomew Kuma
author: InBetweenDrafts
description: Comprehensive episode guide covering all of Bartholomew Kuma's appearances throughout One Piece. Episode 376 is highlighted as the episode where Kuma reveals his full Paw-Paw fruit power in his skirmish with Zoro and the crew, demonstrating techniques like removing his gloves, warping past opponents, and the Ursus Shock.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Comprehensive guide covering Kuma's entire story arc throughout the series including recent episodes

title: One Piece's Thriller Bark Finale Showcases a Team Battle Like No Other in Shonen
author: CBR Editorial
description: Analysis of the team battle dynamics in the Thriller Bark arc finale. Discusses how the crew works together against Oars and Moria, and how Kuma's arrival changes the dynamic, forcing individual sacrifices and showcasing character loyalty.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Analyzes the team battle and Kuma's intervention
